objects.specification: A large rectangular floor panel covering the entire classroom area, finished in light gray tile with subtle grout lines, a smooth, slightly reflective surface that conveys cleanliness and brightness.
A white indoor wall segment with a smooth plaster finish, rectangular shape and minimalistic trim, suitable for mounting classroom fixtures and displays.
A white indoor wall segment with a smooth plaster finish, rectangular shape and minimalistic trim, suitable for mounting classroom fixtures and displays.
A white indoor wall segment with a smooth plaster finish, rectangular shape and minimalistic trim, suitable for mounting classroom fixtures and displays.
A white indoor wall segment with a smooth plaster finish, rectangular shape and minimalistic trim, suitable for mounting classroom fixtures and displays.

A sturdy teacher's desk crafted from dark wood with a rich mahogany finish, featuring a smooth bevel-edged top, modesty panel, and built-in drawers, showcasing realistic wood grain texture and a polished surface.
A large rectangular blackboard with a deep matte black writing surface framed by a slim dark gray metal border, slightly textured for chalk adhesion, with subtle mounting hardware details.
A compact ceiling-mounted projector in matte white plastic, with rounded corners, front-facing lens assembly, ventilation grilles, and a slim mounting bracket, conveying modern audiovisual equipment.

A tall medium-wood-tone bookshelf with six evenly spaced shelves, each filled with assorted colorful books of varying heights, featuring smooth side panels, realistic wood grain finish, and clean edges.

A tall medium-wood-tone bookshelf with six evenly spaced shelves, each filled with assorted colorful books of varying heights, featuring smooth side panels, realistic wood grain finish, and clean edges.
A classic round wall clock with a slim black frame, white face, bold black hour markers and hands, and a slightly domed protective glass cover, offering a clean and readable design.

A decorative potted plant with lush green broad leaves and a natural variation of tones, planted in a simple tapered ceramic pot with a matte neutral finish, conveying a refreshing indoor greenery accent.

A decorative potted plant with lush green broad leaves and a natural variation of tones, planted in a simple tapered ceramic pot with a matte neutral finish, conveying a refreshing indoor greenery accent.
A small cylindrical waste bin in matte dark gray plastic, with an open top and smooth curved surface, providing a discreet functional detail.
A small cylindrical waste bin in matte dark gray plastic, with an open top and smooth curved surface, providing a discreet functional detail.
A large rectangular window with clear glass panes set in a slim white frame, slightly reflective and transparent, allowing natural light to enter the classroom.
Soft fabric curtains in a light neutral tone, gently draped with natural folds, slightly translucent to diffuse incoming light, mounted on a slim rod above the window.
A student desk with a medium wood tone rectangular top and rounded corners, supported by slim metal legs, featuring a smooth finish and subtle wood grain texture for a modern classroom aesthetic.
A student chair with a soft blue molded plastic seat and backrest, gently curved for ergonomic support, mounted on slender metallic legs with a matte finish for a cohesive classroom seating solution.
